channel.title: grape-framework on hilman.io
channel.description: Recent content in grape-framework on hilman.io

item.title: How to test file upload with Grape Framework
item.description: Grape is a Rack based Ruby framework for building API. It’s only a few years old and has not reached version 1.0 yet. The main github page has a very good documentation but is still not as complete as Rails guide. In this post, I will discuss how to test file upload endpoint with RSpec.
